title: Electric/technology neon palette refresh (no layout or copy changes)

requirements.summary: Apply a cohesive electric/technology neon palette via theme tokens while keeping the existing layout, headline text, and code-entry UI structure unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: The page uses a cohesive electric/tech palette (e.g., dark base with bright neon accents such as cyan/teal/magenta) applied consistently across background, text, borders, and focus states.
The headline still displays the exact text “Bytes console winning!” with distinct emphasis per line, but with updated electric/tech colors (e.g., primary and accent feel neon/tech).
The code input’s border and focus ring clearly reflect the updated electric/tech accent color(s) and remain accessible with sufficient contrast against the background.
No changes are made to user-facing copy (e.g., “Enter Code”, placeholder text, footer text) other than color/styling.

file_operations.description: Update the existing CSS variable theme tokens (background/foreground/primary/accent/border/input/ring, etc.) to an electric/technology neon palette (dark base + neon cyan/teal/magenta accents), ensuring sufficient contrast and that focus/hover states remain clear for the shadcn-ui Input/Label styling. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Set the default document theme to the neon-tech dark presentation (e.g., by applying the existing Tailwind dark-mode class at the document level) without changing layout or any user-facing copy.
